name: DOWNGEON
description:
<DownGeon>

The 2D scroll action game 'DownGeon' is a combination of 'Down' and 'Dungeon', indicating a progressive dungeon.
'DownGeon' adds elements of loglike to the 2D scroll action.
You can enjoy 1 stage of game content through 20~30 minutes of play time.
 Feel DownGeon for yourself!

<Weapon Production System>

DownGeon can instantly build and change weapons during the expedition!

You can use the Memory Stone to build weapons from the energy you get from killing monsters.

Immediately the weapon will be a valuable companion to help you explore!

Kill monsters and move deep into the tower using a total of 50 different concepts of random weaponry!

<Pixel Graphics>

All pixel graphics used by 'DownGeon' were self-produced and developed!

Enjoy high-quality pixel graphics with your eyes!

<Character Upgrade>

Gearheat Village in DownGeon has a witch's physical enrichment station.

Upgrade your characters with the crystals you got from the expedition and go on an expedition!

 

 

<Game Features>

- Action + weapons production Fun that you don't know what kind of weapons you'll get.

- High quality pixel graphics

- 50 weapons of various concepts

- Village Content - Character Growth, Item Store

- Battle of Stage 1 Boss
